androidx.leanback.widget

Class SeekBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • androidx.leanback.widget.SeekBar

  • public final class SeekBar
extends View
    Replacement of SeekBar, has two bar heights and two thumb size when focused/not_focused. The widget does not deal with KeyEvent, it's client's responsibility to set a key listener.
